title: Google Photos adds ‘Best of Winter 2021’ Memory collection
content:
Google Photos is now surfacing some of your best photos over the past few months with the rollout of the “Best of Winter 2021” Memories collection.

more…

The post Google Photos adds ‘Best of Winter 2021’ Memory collection appeared first on 9to5Google.
description: Google Photos is now surfacing another AI-generated album of images and videos as part of the "Best of Winter 2021" Memories collections.
